title: Textile, A. 1930, B. 1949, C. 1973
medium:
Medium: A, silk, cotton, linen; B, nylon; C, silk warp, mercerized cotton weft
Technique: combination of two warp-faced weaves
inscribed: Attached labels. A: "part of lambrequin of draperies installed in 1930. Design selected by Col. Atterbury, AIA architect." B: " 1949 replacement fabric. " C: "1973 updated coloring, same design."
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: A: Lambrequin of a triangular shaped gold fabric trimmed with 7.5 (3in) gold braid. B: Length of fabric (gold warp, blue weft) with design of oval medallions, urns, scrolled swags, griffons. Vertically symmetrical. C: Piece of same design in blue warp, yellow weft.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, A. 1930, B. 1949, C. 1973.
A. 1930, B. 1949, C. 1973. Medium: A, silk, cotton, linen; B, nylon; C, silk warp, mercerized cotton weft
Technique: combination of two warp-faced weaves. Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever. 1979-9-27-a/c.
